html.p: This app comes without any warranty. It is currently at an early development stage. Check the code before you run it. Use at your own risk.
Please refer to GRAPH-E on Github for further information.
Configure everything on the configuration page to get this app ready.

ol.li: Point the app towards your Neo4j instance(s) via the configuration page "Neo4j URIs". You may want to use "bolt+ssc://" as URI scheme if your Neo4j instance uses self-signed certificates. See Neo4j URI schemes for further information.
Enter your Neo4j Accounts to login to your configured Neo4j instances via the configuration page "Neo4j Accounts". The default account name on Neo4j Desktop is "neo4j".
You can configure multiple URIs and Accounts. Each custom commands allows to specify which URI and account to use.
